input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item specification.

Item specification:
Schleich Princess

Item keywords:
Perfect addition to your Knights Collection
Hand painted
Highly detailed
input_text.Response A: The Schleich Princess is a beautiful addition to your Knights Collection. It is hand painted and highly detailed, making it a great addition to any child's collection.
input_text.Response B: The Schleich Princess is a perfect addition to your Knights Collection, with excellent hand painting and highly detailed features. This toy is sure to be a hit with children who love to play with knights and princesses. She is expertly crafted and made of the highest quality, durable materials. The Schleich Princess will make an excellent gift for any child who loves creative play.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: Matter of fact, straightforward, no frills.
